job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong>Title: Site Reliability Engineer<br><br>Location: Beaverton, Oregon (97008) / Remote Option<br><br>Employment Type: Direct Hire (no c2c or sponsorship available)<br><br><strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong>EdgeLink is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) to join an expanding team focused on connecting business to cloud applications and environments. From a skills perspective we are targeting most of the following:<br><ul><li>Bachelor' s degree or equivalent practical experience</li><li>Experience supporting development environments that include Linux tools, Bamboo, Puppet, Terraform, AWS, and Azure</li><li>Deep understanding of the Unix/Linux operating systems, including kernel networking packet flow</li><li>Strong understanding of network fundamentals, including tunneling</li><li>Working knowledge of SQL databases</li><li>Experience with algorithms and data structures are a nice to have<br></li></ul>Edgelink would like to thank all applicants, however only those who qualify for an interview will be contacted.<br><br>EdgeLink is an equal opportunity employer.<br><br>Job Requirements<br><br>SRE, DevOps, Site Reliability, CI/CD, Cloud, Azure, AWS, Linux, Bamboo, Puppet, Terraform, Unix, Networking, Tunneling, SQL, Database, Algorithm, Data Structure, VPN<br><br>
